resources.string: A hard worker Experienced software developer with 5 years of professional experience in software development, testing, and networking. eager to join a creative, problem-solving team and I enjoy creating efficient solutions and working with innovative. As technologies are changing on a daily basis, I am always motivated to learn and adapt to new technology. My areas of interest are Angular, Spring, Spring Boot, Hibernate, Node, and Express. I can deliver quality results quickly and effectively

Languages: Java, Python, JavaScript
 Web Services: REST,SOAP, Microservices
 Technologies: Kafka, Spring Frame work, Kubernetes, Jenkins,GCP 
 Design Patterns: Dependency Injection, Adapter,Factory

1.IVR:Interactive voice response or IVR is an automated business phone system feature that interacts with callers and gathers information by giving them choices via a menu.
 2.LMS :A laboratory management system is a web based software system to improve school lab productivity and efficiency, by keeping track of students , experiments, laboratory workflows, and instruments.
 3. ODAT: Object detection and Tracking is an artificial intelligent based project and the main goal is to track the object and log the location.
 4.CTS: Car Tracking System is a web based system that help to track car and display the current location of the car in the google map.
Please, reach out to me for more information about my app.
